headline: Capital One (COF): Valuation in Focus Following Analyst Upgrades and Renewed Credit Trend Optimism
summary: Capital One Financial (COF) has landed in the spotlight after several analyst upgrades and renewed debate about the real risks facing the company. Conversation is heating up regarding improving credit trends and recent shifts in interest rates. See our latest analysis for Capital One Financial. After a volatile stretch driven by sector-wide concerns about consumer credit and some headline risk around legal settlements, Capital One Financial's share price has recently hovered near $214.4...
